DOC.brief_title: Relationship Between Tissue Markes Patients With Post Cardio Respiratory Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluation serum carbon dioxide gradient ( GapCO2 ) , central venous saturation ( ScvO2 ) clearance serum lactate ( Clac ) predict hospital mortality cardiac arrest syndrome ( post-PCR ) . Prospective study , unicenter - Intensive Care Unit - HNSC . Period : May/2010 June/2011 . Serial assessment GapCO2 ScvO2 Clac first 72 hour post-PCR . Excluded 18 , survival le 6HS , pregnant woman , traumatize , post-operative hypothermia liver disease . T-student test , 95 % ( p < 0.05 ) .
